20110110150633.000|20110110150635.000|CC1|HOME CONTAINED A LETTER WITH THE
20110110150635.000|20110110150637.000|CC1|WORDS "I PLANNED AHEAD, MY      
20110110150637.000|20110110150639.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION AND GIFFORDS."

20110110150646.000|20110110150649.000|CC1|MONTHS.

20110110150655.000|20110110150657.000|CC1|RAMBLING, INCOHERENT YOUTUBE

20110110150700.000|20110110150701.000|CC1|HE CHANGED RADICALLY.

20110110150702.000|20110110150703.000|CC1|THINKER BUT IT WAS NEVER
